title: 110_hr4337
content: Emergency Relief Tax Check-Off for Our Armed Forces Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for charitable contributions of up to $1,000 to the Armed Forces Relief Trust. Allows taxpayers to designate on their tax returns a portion of any overpayment of tax as a contribution to the Trust or to make a cash contribution to the Trust with their tax returns. Establishes an advisory board to advise the Trust on its operation and on the distribution of contributed funds.
